MyOs  0.0.0
MyOs based on Contiki-Os concepts for memory constrained microcontrollers.

37 #ifndef ETIMER_H_
38 #define ETIMER_H_
39 
40 #include "myos.h"
41 
42 typedef struct {
43  ptimer_t ptimer;
44  process_event_t evt;
45 }etimer_t;
46 
47 #define etimer_module_init() ptimer_module_init()
48 void etimer_start(etimer_t *etimer, timespan_t span, process_t *to, process_event_id_t evtid, void *data);
49 #define etimer_restart(etimerptr) ptimer_restart((ptimer_t*)etimerptr)
50 #define etimer_reset(etimerptr) ptimer_reset((ptimer_t*)etimerptr)
51 #define etimer_stop(etimerptr) ptimer_stop((ptimer_t*)etimerptr)
52 #define etimer_expired(etimerptr) ptimer_expired((ptimer_t*)etimerptr)
53 
54 
55 
56 #define PROCESS_SLEEP(etimerptr,span) \
57  do{ \
58  etimer_start(etimerptr, span, PROCESS_THIS(), PROCESS_EVENT_CONTINUE, NULL); \
59  PROCESS_WAIT_EVENT(PROCESS_EVENT_CONTINUE); \
60  }while(0)
61 
62 #endif /* ETIMER_H_ */
